types.name: String
types.description: The String scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF‐8 character sequences

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The Boolean scalar type represents true or false

types.name: Float
types.description: The Float scalar type represents signed double‐precision fractional values as specified by IEEE 754

types.name: Int
types.description: The Int scalar type represents a signed 32‐bit numeric non‐fractional value

types.name: Long
types.description: The Long scalar type represents a signed 64‐bit numeric non‐fractional value

fields.name: createMovie
fields.description: Adds a new movie to the database

fields.name: movie
fields.description: Returns a movie item based on the queried name

fields.name: movies
fields.description: Returns the entire list of movies

fields.name: popularMovies
fields.description: Returns a list of popular movies

args.name: year
args.description: Popular movies retrieved based on year

fields.name: movieCast
fields.description: Gets the credits for a given movie id

fields.name: moviesWithMainActors
fields.description: A list of movies with adjacent credits

args.name: year
args.description: Popular movies by year with adjacent Credits
